snippet: The Red Wings lost a late two-goal lead but defeated the Ducks in overtime in Detroit to force a decisive Game 7 in their first-round playoff series.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Detroit Red Wings rally to beat Anaheim Ducks, 4-3, in overtime, forcing  decisive Game 7 of first-round playoff series; other hockey scores and news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and JEFF Z. KLEIN

lead_paragraph: The Red Wings lost a late two-goal lead but defeated the Ducks in overtime in Detroit to force a decisive Game 7 in their first-round playoff series.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Playoffs — Red Wings Beat Ducks in Overtime to Force Game 7
headline.main: After Blowing Lead Late in Regulation, Red Wings Beat Ducks to Force Game 7
headline.print_headline: After Blowing Lead Late in Regulation, Red Wings Beat Ducks to Force Game 7
